channel.title: Webshop wordpress, goes to sandbox paypal
channel.description:
So i,ve got a friend who made a facebook page that has over 23.000 likes, and is still growing. He asked me to make him a webshop to sell stuff about the page, like t-shirts and other crap. So i installed wordpress, putted the OneCart commerce themeforest template on it. (I'm not a webdeveloper or designer) But i do know the basics of html and stuff about mysql and other crap.) Got the webshop working 99%, but the only problem is.... it goes to sandbox paypal and not to the real paypal. How could i fix this? I've searched in
Checkout.php Checkout-form.php Checkout-form-info.php Checkout-summary.php
But no results... (php files) [url=http://www29.zippyshare.com/v/92697851/file.html]http://www29.zippyshare.com/v/92697851/file.html[/url]

item.title: Webshop wordpress, goes to sandbox paypal
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:506677”][quote author=oldschool-scape link=topic=624913.msg4255209#msg4255209 date=1362614185]

Can you post them on pastie.org/pastebin.com? My download is incredibly slow

It’s only 200kb

Uploading 50± files on pastebin one by one would take ages. =/

Or can i upload them all at once?
Never used pastebin.
[/quote]
All you do is copy/paste, take the code from the file, copy it, then paste it there. I also don’t want a load of junk files clogging my laptop up :> considering it’s 6/7 years old and it’s running on it’s last legs lol[/quote]

Alright, there are 80 files, so gona take a while

But i guess i dont need to add the “ajax” and “js” Files, so i’ve only got upload 48 files

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:5, topic:506677”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=624913.msg4255207#msg4255207 date=1362613727]
Can you post them on pastie.org/pastebin.com? My download is incredibly slow
[/quote]

It’s only 200kb

Uploading 50± files on pastebin one by one would take ages. =/

Or can i upload them all at once?
Never used pastebin.[/quote]
All you do is copy/paste, take the code from the file, copy it, then paste it there. I also don’t want a load of junk files clogging my laptop up :> considering it’s 6/7 years old and it’s running on it’s last legs lol
